channel.title: New NPC HELP! :(
channel.description: I spawned an npc (1159) and I want to know how to make it say things. and what file should I Search under !! ty!

item.title: New NPC HELP! :(
item.dc:creator: @Exist2inspire Exist2inspire
item.description:
@Exist2inspire wrote:

[quote=“kniveslives, post:8, topic:151863”][quote author=Cryme Time link=topic=207768.msg1823798#msg1823798 date=1192448893]

it’s in npchandler.cfg or npc.cfg (can’t remember lol)
[/quote] dude he is a fucking retard trust me. go into npchandler and search “moo” or an existing npc’s words. just make a new on copy and paste one that exists verry likely one already does.

No need to call him a name, he did answer part of the question, partly, he was just trying to help, no need to be mean to him.[/quote]

ahuh, what he said.

ok, say you see a NPC saying “cryme time is a dickhead” what you do is open up your npchandler.cfg and search for cryme time is a dickhead then all you have to do is change it to whatever you like, example: cryme time is a super dickhead

you can also copy the whole code and paste it below. then all you have to do is change the npc id at the top and whatever you have changed it to will say the word you have in that code

i know thats a bit hard to understand, so i simplified it:

search for: (in your npchandler.cfg)

if (npcs[i].npcType ==

below it you will see:

						if (npcs[i].npcType == 1413) { //the npc id
						if (misc.random2(22) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "Mining Portal below me!"; //what it says
						}
					}

just edit it to suit your needs.

Read full topic
